(Affects Magic Beings Only [magiconly], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster creates a supernatural force diametrically opposed to a target magical being. If the spell is powerful enough, the magical being will be disenchanted and cease to exist.
